name: Hurl the Swirl
description:
The world is filling up with negative energy. Be the change! Be the Light! 

How to Play

Your goal is to  hurl yourself, a swirling green positive energy cube, into the world filling up with red negative energy cubes. As you hurl yourself at them, you eliminate them. You can also hurl swirling  rays of sunshine to help the cause . Hurry! The world needs you now!

*Sound Included

Controls

Arrow Keys or W-A-S-D for Movement

Space Bar to Hurl Sunshine

Credits

Audio by LightspeedLife
